includedAssets.title: Resurrection
includedAssets.synopsis: The chilling thriller returns. Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) is recalled to investigate a new murder spree.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The chilling thriller returns. Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) is recalled to investigate a new murder spree.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The chilling thriller returns. Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) is recalled to investigate a new murder spree.

includedAssets.title: For Joe
includedAssets.synopsis: As revelations about Joe Carroll come to light, strange phone calls present Ryan with his biggest threat yet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As revelations about Joe Carroll come to light, strange phone calls present Ryan with his biggest threat yet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As revelations about Joe Carroll come to light, strange phone calls present Ryan with his biggest threat yet.

includedAssets.title: Trust Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan continues to hunt for a link between recent violent events in New York and members of the Havenport Cult.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan continues to hunt for a link between recent violent events in New York and members of the Havenport Cult.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan continues to hunt for a link between recent violent events in New York and members of the Havenport Cult.

includedAssets.title: Family Affair
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan delves further into the puzzle of Joe Carroll's return while dangerously trying to stay ahead of the FBI.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan delves further into the puzzle of Joe Carroll's return while dangerously trying to stay ahead of the FBI.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan delves further into the puzzle of Joe Carroll's return while dangerously trying to stay ahead of the FBI.

includedAssets.title: Reflection
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan and Max capture a suspect, while Emma realises she is keeping dangerous company.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan and Max capture a suspect, while Emma realises she is keeping dangerous company.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan and Max capture a suspect, while Emma realises she is keeping dangerous company.

includedAssets.title: Fly Away
includedAssets.synopsis: When Ryan & Max turn to the FBI for back-up, Weston has other ideas. Luke finds himself in a troubling situation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Ryan & Max turn to the FBI for back-up, Weston has other ideas. Luke finds himself in a troubling situation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Ryan & Max turn to the FBI for back-up, Weston has other ideas. Luke finds himself in a troubling situation.

includedAssets.title: Sacrifice
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan and the FBI continue their hunt for Lily Gray and a new threat enters Max's life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan and the FBI continue their hunt for Lily Gray and a new threat enters Max's life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan and the FBI continue their hunt for Lily Gray and a new threat enters Max's life.

includedAssets.title: The Messenger
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan attempts to find the man who taught Joe to kill and Emma and Mandy wait for Joe to reveal his new plan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan attempts to find the man who taught Joe to kill and Emma and Mandy wait for Joe to reveal his new plan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan attempts to find the man who taught Joe to kill and Emma and Mandy wait for Joe to reveal his new plan.

includedAssets.title: Unmasked
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan, Max and Weston discover information that leads them closer to uncovering the mole within the FBI. Joe delivers a deadly message to the world.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan, Max and Weston discover information that leads them closer to uncovering the mole within the FBI. Joe delivers a deadly message to the world.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan, Max and Weston discover information that leads them closer to uncovering the mole within the FBI. Joe delivers a deadly message to the world.

includedAssets.title: Teacher's Pet
includedAssets.synopsis: While Joe turns to his new followers to put his latest evil plan into action, Ryan and Max try to contact him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Joe turns to his new followers to put his latest evil plan into action, Ryan and Max try to contact him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Joe turns to his new followers to put his latest evil plan into action, Ryan and Max try to contact him.

includedAssets.title: Freedom
includedAssets.synopsis: A deadly massacre, thought to be sparked by Joe Carroll, leads Ryan and Mike into dangerous territory.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A deadly massacre, thought to be sparked by Joe Carroll, leads Ryan and Mike into dangerous territory.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A deadly massacre, thought to be sparked by Joe Carroll, leads Ryan and Mike into dangerous territory.

includedAssets.title: Betrayal
includedAssets.synopsis: Mandy makes a decision that threatens everything Joe has been working towards, while Ryan receives shocking news.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mandy makes a decision that threatens everything Joe has been working towards, while Ryan receives shocking news.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mandy makes a decision that threatens everything Joe has been working towards, while Ryan receives shocking news.

includedAssets.title: The Reaping
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan's plan doesn't quite go as intended when he locates the Korban compound with hopes of infiltrating and capturing Joe.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan's plan doesn't quite go as intended when he locates the Korban compound with hopes of infiltrating and capturing Joe.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan's plan doesn't quite go as intended when he locates the Korban compound with hopes of infiltrating and capturing Joe.

includedAssets.title: Silence
includedAssets.synopsis: As Joe Carroll puts his final plan into action, Ryan and Mike pull out all the stops to prevent more innocent lives being lost.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Joe Carroll puts his final plan into action, Ryan and Mike pull out all the stops to prevent more innocent lives being lost.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Joe Carroll puts his final plan into action, Ryan and Mike pull out all the stops to prevent more innocent lives being lost.

includedAssets.title: Forgive
includedAssets.synopsis: The second season of the gripping thriller concludes as the twins turn the tables on Ryan and Joe and force them to work together.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The second season of the gripping thriller concludes as the twins turn the tables on Ryan and Joe and force them to work together.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The second season of the gripping thriller concludes as the twins turn the tables on Ryan and Joe and force them to work together.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Retired FBI agent Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) teams up with his niece, NYPD detective Max Hardy (Jessica Stroup), to find Joe Carroll (James Purefoy) and stop the emergence of a new deadly cult. Chilling second season of the psychological horror thriller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) teams up with his niece to find Joe Carroll and stop the emergence of a new deadly cult. Chilling second season.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Retired FBI agent Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) teams up with his niece, NYPD detective Max Hardy (Jessica Stroup), to find Joe Carroll (James Purefoy) and stop the emergence of a new deadly cult. Chilling second season of the psychological horror thriller.

includedIn.title: The Following
includedIn.synopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer and the cult of believers who follow his every command.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans.

title: The Following Season 2
synopsis: Retired FBI agent Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) teams up with his niece, NYPD detective Max Hardy (Jessica Stroup), to find Joe Carroll (James Purefoy) and stop the emergence of a new deadly cult. Chilling second season of the psychological horror thriller.
